name: Rahulresume
body:
### CAREER OBJECTIVE .
To obtain a researcher position in the field of remote sensing application in water resource so that I can associate myself with a dynamically progressing institution and the nation, which my talents fit in rightly thus putting my expertise to the best use for the institution as well as widening my technical spectrum.

### ACADEMIC PROFILE 

Examination/Degree	
Board/University	
Institution	Year of Passing	Marks Obtained
Mater’s of Technology in Geoinformatics and Natural Resource Engineering	Indian Institute of Technology Bombay	Center of Studies in Resource Engineering Indian Institute of Technology Bombay Powai, Mumbai, India 400076 www.csre.iitb.ac.in
2016
	8.52
(CPI 10)
Bachelor of Technology in Civil Engineering	Walchand College of Engineering Sangli	Walchand College of Engineering Sangli, Maharashtra, India  416415 http://www.walchandsangli.ac.in/	2013	6.89
(CPI 10)
Higher Secondary (10+2)	Maharastra Sate Board	Pandit BAchharaj Vyas Vidhyalay, Nagpur, M.S. ,India 440009	2008	73.33%
Secondary (10th)	Maharastra Sate Board	Keshav Nagar Madhyamik Vidhyalay, Nagpur, M.S., India 440009	2006	82%

###  TECHNICAL SKILL 
LANGUAGES: MATLAB|Python|R
SOFTWARE and TOOLS: ArcGIS 10.3| Quantum GIS| ERDAS Imagine 2013|ENVI 5.1|PolSAR Pro|NEST 5.1
DRAFTING AND DESIGN SOFTTOOLS: AutoCAD

### ACADEMIC PROJECTS 
Village Level Groundwater Assessment Using Geospatial Technique (M.Tech dissertation)
	Geospatial data base creation (Scanning , Digitization and  generating different thematic maps)
 
	Trend analysis of Rainfall (Weekly, Monthly and Yearly) and Groundwater level (Pre monsoon and Post Monsoon).
	Estimation of Ratio of Rainfall and Groundwater Recharge at Village level.
	LULC Change Detection from LANDSAT satellite data
	Watershed Delineation and stream network analysis for watershed characterization using GIS
	Estimation of Village level water demand (Drinking and Irrigation) and Groundwater recharge.
	Landslide hazard mapping, vulnerability assessment & mitigative recommendation using GIS and remote sensing technology (Bachelor’s Thesis).
	Assessed risks & hazards due to landslides using geological, morphological, physical and human causes.
	Mapped of landslide hazardous zone in Mahabaleshwar state highway no.76 in Western Ghats
	Proposed risk mitigation plan to government of Maharashtra.
Village Level Groundwater Assessment Using Geospatial Technique (M.Tech dissertation)
	Geospatial data base creation (Scanning , Digitization and  generating different thematic maps)
 
	Trend analysis of Rainfall (Weekly, Monthly and Yearly) and Groundwater level (Pre monsoon and Post Monsoon).
	Estimation of Ratio of Rainfall and Groundwater Recharge at Village level.
	LULC Change Detection from LANDSAT satellite data
	Watershed Delineation and stream network analysis for watershed characterization using GIS
	Estimation of Village level water demand (Drinking and Irrigation) and Groundwater recharge.
	Landslide hazard mapping, vulnerability assessment & mitigative recommendation using GIS and remote sensing technology (Bachelor’s Thesis).
	Assessed risks & hazards due to landslides using geological, morphological, physical and human causes.
	Mapped of landslide hazardous zone in Mahabaleshwar state highway no.76 in Western Ghats
	Proposed risk mitigation plan to government of Maharashtra.
